ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: With hardship indeed there is ease.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Most certainly, there is ease with hardship.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Certainly, after every difficulty there comes relief.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Verily, along with every hardship is relief.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: surely, with every hardship there is ease.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Verily along with every hardship is ease.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Verily, with every difficulty there is relief.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Verily, with the hardship, there is relief (i.e. there is one hardship with two reliefs, so one hardship cannot overcome two reliefs).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: indeed, hardship is followed by ease!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [94:6] Truly with hardship comes ease: the Prophet (s) suffered much hardship at the hands of the disbelievers, but then he enjoyed ease when he was assisted to victory [by God] over them.
